description: Babylonian numbers: integers in base 60 with each sexagesimal digit represented by 2 decimal digits.
references: Mohammad K. Azarian, Meftah al-hesab: A Summary, MJMS, Vol. 12, No. 2, Spring 2000, pp. 75-95. Mathematical Reviews, MR 1 764 526. Zentralblatt MATH, Zbl 1036.01002.
Mohammad K. Azarian, A Summary of Mathematical Works of Ghiyath ud-din Jamshid Kashani, Journal of Recreational Mathematics, Vol. 29(1), pp. 32-42, 1998.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 06 2000
extensions: a(69) and a(70) from _WG Zeist_, Sep 08 2012
